definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: At dinner time he usually sleeps in the vacant chair.
sentences.chinese: 吃晚饭时，他通常绻在空椅上睡觉。

sentences.english: The cold air in the room diffuses, I reluctantly curl up shrinkage in the corner of the humble.

sentences.chinese: 你的刺猬可能会绻成一个小球。
